latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Survey for assessing changes in agriculture and livelihood in Ayeyarwardy division, Myanmar  (1996)

authorName.value: Hossain, M., Garcia, Y. and Daw M Oo

dsDescriptionValue.value: To assess the impact of adoption of new rice-based technologies on income and employment of rural households under varying agro-ecosystems.

keywordValue.value: Socio-economic variables related to adoption of new rice-based technologies and farming practices; changes in agriculture and livelihood and factors contributing to productivity gaps

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 739;
